docs.title: Welcome to FleetingViews
docs.text: FleetingViews is a powerful library for managing views in Flet applications. It offers a streamlined approach to creating, navigating, and managing views with customizable designs and easy-to-use methods.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
1. Automatic View Creation with Customized Design: Quickly create views with specified settings, including background colors, alignments, and other attributes.

  2. View History for "Back" Calls: Navigate back to previous views effortlessly, enhancing the user experience.

  3. Custom Append Method: Easily add controls to specific views with a custom append method.

  4. Clear Method: Reset the view history with a simple clear method.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
To install FleetingViews, use the following command: 

pip install fleetingviews
